Text.Page: You have received an invitation to the "Castanica Beach Party" from Elesa of Serpentis Isle.

Hey, ! Remember me? I haven't seen you in forever!

I'm hanging out in Castanica these days, at the big beach party! Are you coming to that? I'd sure love to see you again!

If you don't see me on the beach, stop in at the West Beach Tavern, and ask the bartender if she's seen me!

Can't wait!
–S

Welcome, friend ! This is your first time to come to the Beach Party, right?

Did you bring your invitation? I'm joking—you don't need one! Everyone is welcome!

Let me tell you all about the fun and exciting things you can do during the beach party!
